name: Hodaya Nurelyan
title: Full Stack Developer
summary: Full Stack Team Leader with over a decade of experience in software engineering.

about.p1: Hi! I'm Hodaya Nurelyan – a Full Stack Developer, Team Leader, and lifelong tech enthusiast with over 12 years of experience (but who's counting?).

about.p2: Throughout my career, I've built complex systems, smart platforms, websites, and digital products – basically anything that can go from idea to reality with some code and a lot of thoughtful design. I love turning complicated challenges into simple, elegant solutions that not only work smoothly but also look great.

about.p3: I'm a strong believer in lifelong learning and truly enjoy mentoring junior developers. I'm always striving to grow – both technically and personally. I thrive in dynamic, agile environments and enjoy the challenge of solving complex problems while transforming them into intuitive, user-friendly experiences.

about.p4: The mix of creativity and technical precision is what drives me – bringing ideas to life, exploring new technologies, and staying endlessly curious, and when I'm not writing code... I'm probably just thinking about the next one.

education.school: Mahat - Government institute for technology training

experience.title: Full Stack Developer / Team Leader
highlights: As a Senior Full Stack Developer & Team Leader at Signature IT, I led the development of an enterprise-grade B2B SaaS platform (PIM) tailored for government and large-scale clients. I integrated AI and LLM technologies, designed a smart multilingual CMS, and optimized system performance. I collaborated on architectural planning, implemented modular infrastructure, Additionally, I mentored developers, conducted code reviews, and consistently delivered high-quality solutions within an Agile environment. Alongside my professional role, I’ve also built several independent projects, allowing me to deepen my expertise with cutting-edge technologies expanding both my technical skills and product thinking.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
highlights: I developed full-stack web solutions using WordPress and Drupal platforms. I built custom CMS functionalities tailored to client needs and integrated RESTful APIs for seamless system communication. I designed pixel-perfect, responsive websites with a strong focus on user experience and cross-device compatibility, ensuring high-quality and accessible web applications.

projects.description: Generate Beautiful Quotes That Win More Business , QuickQuote helps freelancers and small businesses create professional, branded price quotes that impress clients and close deals faster.
